title: Yorplife picture
content:
The other day I was bored, and did a quick yorp sketch:

[img]http://i16.photobucket.com/albums/b33/freeyorp101/yorplife.png[/img]

90% of graphics are ripped, and some yorps shodows are the wrong way around, but it was a quick sketch, not a big thing.

note to KeenRush: sorry about the garg sign, but that was how it was decribed as in keen1 [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] .

Look who is in the prison, hee hee.

What do you think?

[img]http://i16.photobucket.com/albums/b33/freeyorp101/signat.jpg[/img]

[hr]

The yorp shalt inherit the mars

title: Re: Yorplife picture
content:
As you said; its nearly all ripped graphics, and a bit esoteric. You should try a little computer generated or pencil sketch art.

Otherwise... interesting.A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Yorplife picture
content:
Some points:

Landing bay.(top left) a steady stream of visitors come from here [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] .

Coolant system (acme patent pending) so cold here that icicles have formed, and the lift barely moves at all.

admitting shield (green field near main lift shaft) to keep out unwanted guests and invaders.

lift doors: sometimes they open early, so look before you leap!

snack bar: yummy candy to eat!

prison: look who's home!!!

yorp oracles: give words of advice to troubled creatures. these ancient psychic statues know excactly what to say.

KEEN MEMORIAL STATUE: a masterpiece so that all yorps remember him when he left so soon ...

holy pogo stick: to replace the one (or two [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ) that keen took with him.

lift shafts: the travel mechanisms for yorps everywhare. don't fall down early opening doors!

And more when I fill the white spaces.

Overall, a yorp city/fortress in mars (or a space station or something.)

If you like, I'll develop it, filling white space and maybe animating it if I can find the time.

Ideas, comments?

[img]http://i16.photobucket.com/albums/b33/freeyorp101/signat.jpg[/img]

[hr]

The yorp shalt inherit the mars
